original_text: Eleazar was with David at Pas-Dammim. The Philistine soldiers were ready to attack the Israelites. There was a field there with a lot of barley. The Israelites ran away from the Philistines.
korean_text: 그가 바스담밈에서 다윗과 함께 있었더니 블레셋 사람들이 그 곳에 모여와서 치니 거기에 보리가 많이 난 밭이 있더라 백성들이 블레셋 사람들 앞에서 도망하되

sentences.original_text: Eleazar was with David at Pas-Dammim
The Philistine soldiers were ready to attack
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 군인들은 공격할 준비가 되어 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: the Philistine soldiers were ready to attack the Israelites
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 군인들은 이스라엘 사람들을 공격할 준비가 되어 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: There was a field there with a lot of barley
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에는 보리가 많이 있는 밭이 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: The Israelites ran away from the Philistines
